name: Subscribe your team to blog or news (RSS + Email)
description:
Keep Your Team Informed with Automated Email Updates!

Would you like your team members to receive regular updates from your preferred news source or blog? By setting up this automation, your team can get daily email summaries of the latest news and developments relevant to your work.

Choose a news source or blog, and we'll take care of the rest, ensuring your team is always in the loop. Try using any of the suggested feeds below - copy and paste them into the RSS module!

[MIT News](https://news.mit.edu/rss/topic/artificial-intelligence2)
[Wired Tech](https://www.wired.com/feed/rss)
[BBC News: Technology](http://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/technology/rss.xml)
